mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Clarysville Hospital. Civil War Records of Samuel West, Physician
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Harvey, George
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Lancaster, North Street [North Street, Lancaster, Lancaster County, Pennsylvania]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Harvey, George Patient Age: 18. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Contusion of right ankle outer aspect with laceration of integuments. Location Wounded: Near Bunker Hill. Date Wounded: 1864/06/20. Nature of Wound: Wagon wheel ran over the leg. Result: Returned to duty under guard for disorderly conduct and disobedience of orders, a dastardly mean boy! - S B West Actg Asst Surgeon W.S.A..
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Harvey, George
Contusion of right ankle outer aspect with laceration of integuments
